title: Increase header logo image size while preserving h-16 header fit

requirements.summary: Make the header brand logo render larger while remaining fully contained within the existing h-16 header height, changing only that element.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo image is noticeably larger than before and is easily readable at a glance.
The logo image remains fully contained within the header (no vertical overflow/clipping) across common viewport widths.
Only the selected logo element styling/attributes are modified; no unrelated header/nav elements are changed.

file_operations.description: Adjust only the selected header logo element’s Tailwind classes to increase its rendered size while staying within the h-16 header (e.g., increase the img height and use compensating negative vertical margins so it fits cleanly despite the parent link’s existing vertical padding). Do not change surrounding header/nav/link layout or other elements.
